resources.string: Goats are the most commonly encountered in Indonesia, especially on Eid al-Adha, besides that they have a strong immune system so they don\'t get sick easily and are very easy to care for, weighing only 30 kg while female goats reach 25 kg.
Etawa goats are known as goats that produce delicious milk and many have the characteristics of short legs, goat height ranges from 127 cm for male goats to 92 cm high for female goats.

"Jawaradu goat is the result of a cross between a Kacang goat and an Etawa goat, its size weighs 40 kg. The characteristic feature of the Jawaradu goat is the presence of small horns with long ears that fall off. "
This goat has the nickname as a cow goat, the weight of an adult Boer goat can reach up to 150 kg. Boer goat has short fur.
This type of goat is often found in the area of ​​West Java and its surroundings. This goat is the result of crossbreeding between the Kacang goat and the typical Mir goat
Rabbit originating from the Netherlands weighing 1.1-2.5 pounds, the Dutch Dwarf is one of the smallest rabbit breeds
"The rabbit Orictolagus cuniculus also called the European rabbit or the domestic rabbit is the only species in its genus "
Holland Lop rabbits are independent and playful rabbits
"Is a type of domestic rabbit that is recognized by the American Rabbit Association "
Originally from Ankara, Turkey with the characteristic of long and soft hair
"Is the result of a cross between an Asian Leopard Cat and a British domestic cat "
"It is said that originally a cat breed that used to accompany the monks who settled in temples in Burma "
"A long-haired cat with a round face and a snub nose. Originally from Iran then imported to Italy "
"A cat derived from the Wichian Maat (Thai cat) with a characteristic long and slender body, oval face, wide ears, and bluish eyes "
